name: createSourcingProject
description: PRIMARY ACTION: Create a sourcing project using text-based input. Use this IMMEDIATELY when user mentions: 'create', 'new project', 'start project', 'make project', 'sourcing project', or ANY intent to create a project. Parse project details from natural language input.

input.description: User's project details including title, description, email address, start/end dates, and budget

name: upsertMilestones
description: Add or update project milestones and deliverables for an existing sourcing project

input.description: User's milestone details with titles and delivery dates

name: findSuppliers
description: MILESTONE COMPLETION ACTION: Find suitable suppliers for the sourcing project. Use this IMMEDIATELY after milestones are created or when user asks to 'find suppliers', 'search suppliers', 'get vendors', 'recommend suppliers', or ANY intent to find vendors for the project.

input.description: Optional additional criteria for supplier search

name: selectSuppliers
description: SUPPLIER SELECTION ACTION: Select specific suppliers from the found list. Use when user indicates which suppliers they want to select from the recommendations.

selectedSuppliers.description: User's supplier selection details or supplier numbers

name: publishProject
description: FINAL ACTION: Show project publication details and ask for confirmation. Use when user wants to 'publish', 'finalize', 'complete', or 'submit' the project.

name: confirmPublishProject
description: CONFIRMATION ACTION: Execute project publication when user confirms. Use when user responds with 'yes', 'confirm', 'proceed', or similar confirmation to publish.

confirmed.description: User confirmation to proceed with publishing

name: confirmPublish
description: Alternative confirmation action for project publication. Use when user confirms publishing the project.

confirmed.description: User confirmation to proceed with publishing

name: resetWorkflow
description: Reset the entire workflow and start over from the beginning

reason.description: Optional reason for resetting the workflow

name: showSuppliers
description: Display the list of available suppliers that have been found for the project. Use this when user requests to view, show, display, or see suppliers. Only works after suppliers have been found.

input.description: Optional user input for showing suppliers
